ygData.subject: Re: EQ Update
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, I don t really like telling any of the other characters I meet that I really am a woman so it doesn t become an issue that often. I find that when I have
ygData.messageBody:
Well, I don't really like telling any of the other
characters I meet that I really am a woman so it
doesn't become an issue that often. I find that when I
have told them in the past, they become overly
flirtatous and it gets in the way of what I find fun
in the game. If I'm taken for a guy, I just go with
it. BTW, all my characters are female just because
that's what I feel comfortable with. :)
I don't really flirt with any of the other characters
either unless they start it because I have been
accused in the past of being homosexual (Like that's a
really horrible thing to begin with...)because the
other person just wouldn't believe I was a female,
which bothered me just because I really am female, you
know?.
I'd rather just be called bro and leave it at that. :)
